name: Colors of the Mind
description:
Colors of the Mind is a one-screen platformer shooter about dealing with the shortcomings of your own mind. Defeat your ghosts and inner demons with three different weapons, and paint your way through all your troubles!

This is my entry for Minijam 111: Colors

  •  Theme: Colors
  • Limitation: You are your own Enemy

Controls:

This game requires Keyboard & Mouse to play.

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move/Jump
  • Space Bar: Also Jump
  • Left Click: Shoot / Confirm menu options / Skip Monologue
  • E or Right Click: Switch Weapon

Credits:

All assets made by me, except fonts:

Chalk-y font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/chalk-y.font?l[]=10&l[]=1 by Ştefancu Gabi

Awesome font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/awesome-dp.font?sort=date&l[]=10&l[]=1 by Danny Phantom

Have fun!
